Content: Tarun Bhattacharya, to date, is among the rarest of musicians across the globe to have fashioned his instrument to work amiably for both classical and fusion concerts. Having a fusion group of his own
Author: Srivathsan Nadadhur
Description: Tarun Bhattacharya, to date, is among the rarest of musicians across the globe to have fashioned his instrument to work amiably for both classical and fusion concerts. Having a fusion group of his own
